alert.note: Alert for Rota; Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 17 at 4:11AM ChST until January 18 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Tinian and Saipan. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 PM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, and along higher terrain. Canopies, tarps, other loose structures and small objects will be blown away if not already fastened or secured. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A speedy descent of a shear line induced by a significant pressure gradient between an extensive synoptic low in the open north Pacific, and a strong high following closely behind it, will bring damaging winds to the region through late Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: People should minimize their exposure outside to a possibility for falling objects such as coconuts, breadfruit, and other hanging objects in jungle areas, including trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive, especially in or near higher terrain.
